website_summaries.verdict: Puma Smash v2 shoes are your classic Smash icons done up in elegant suede. The shoes feature understated colorways that can be worn with everything, and the appearance of white soles (for most colorways) gives them a pop that’s hard not to stare at. The comfort is surprisingly tops for these retro kicks, although enhanced arch support might make them feel all the better. Some feel that the soles are not as well-constructed as with other Puma models, but hopefully, it’s only true for a small batch of the shoes.
pros: According to many reviews, Puma Smash v2 sneakers are so much more comfortable than expected
There’s enough sidewall support in the shoes that you can walk in them for days, a couple of people have claimed
A good number of users commend the classic style of Puma Smash v2 shoes
These kicks offer people a perfect fit, several individuals have remarked
The suede uppers of the Puma Smash v2s are soft and of superb quality, plenty of purchasers say
A handful of consumers are happy about the wide variety of colors available to these shoes from Puma
The price of the sneakers is quite low, making it a good buy for some
One person is using the Puma Smash v2s as skate shoes and they perform well
cons: Less than four testers dislike the soles of the Puma Smash v2s because they unglued/collapsed, especially around the heel part
The shoes lack arch support, a couple of people say

customer_reviews.title: For Your Feet!
customer_reviews.text: I put them on and just ran. I don't know why but I wanted to so I ran, I ran so far away. It was great. They say Puma on the side which I thought was weird, I would have preferred another animal but I still like them enough to wear them to church with my clean outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Dane Madison

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased other Puma Shoes from amazon, That lasted me a while. I had expected similar with these. These, Within 2 weeks the sole of the show has broken down, Every time I step i feel the " square rubber" from failing inserts. It has been a little over a month now and I will need to be replacing them very soon. I won't be replacing them with PUMA. I'm not a big guy, and if the other shoes can handle it for 6 months + these from the same company shouldn't fail in 2 weeks. Sorry, These are junk. Payless Had better shoes.
customer_reviews.author: micah

customer_reviews.title: Not for active wear!
customer_reviews.text: There are pro’s and con’s with these. They look great and the fit is good. However the soles are the thinnest on any shoes I have ever seen. You will feel every pebble. Don’t count on these for everyday wear and definitely not if you need to walk or be active. They will not last two weeks of active use. But they will be fine to wear out to dinner or to the movies and will look great doing it. Style over substance is okay sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: They shoes y'all
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit great, like Tony the Tiger great. And they also make me feel like the best pokemon master ever thanks to high waisted shorts and yellow crop tops coming back into fashion. Thanks, Puma!
customer_reviews.author: Lalalalisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these shoes very recently and noticed the insides are already shredding apart. Every pair of pumas ive ever owned has lasted in tact longer than a year at least. These shoes are garbage indeed too good tp be true at 25 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Smash V2 model runs wider at mid shoe and less snug at heel than earlier Smash
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful High Risk Red color. I own 2 pairs of Smash series that fit very well in my size 10.5. This V2 Smash is the same length and the toe box is the same width, but the mid shoe is a quarter of an inch wider (measured by putting sole of Smash against the sole of Smash V2.) So the Smash fits my narrow heel foot nicely, but the V2 feels bigger in ankle-heel area and doesn't provide a snug fit around the heel. There is no indication on the product page or the product packaging of Width. Giving a three-star for inconsistent fit. Five stars for color and quality. I decided to return them.
customer_reviews.author: awdiokreep

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable but look good
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, but out of all the shoes I have purchased since 2019 these are the most uncomfortable :( Sad because I really like them. They make my feet feel tired and achy After I wear them for about 8hrs like I do all my other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kawaguy

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of support in the sole - Insole fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Update: 3 and 1/2 months and the insole is shot. I wear these shoes 6 - 8 hours a week on the racquetball court. Puma should be ashamed of themselves. Original review: Rated stars Overall the shoe is OK. I have sensitive feet and the sole is a little thin for me. Purchased for use on a hardwood court. They will be OK, but I would not purchase again for my intended use. May be OK for walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Theses sneakers came defective they had a tear in the the back seam is coming apart. I own a few of these pumas never had a worse pair
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Padilla

customer_reviews.title: High build quality, great fit.  No break-in period at all.
customer_reviews.text: Never owned Pumas before. After I received them I have to say they might be the best casual sneakers I've owned. They didn't require any lace adjustments at all. The interior is cushioned, I haven't felt any foot fatigue yet even after walking a few miles. They did not need to be broken in at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I hate arch support and like a classic narrow fit. Also I live in a city where I walk miles everyday. These are a great price, very durable (have worn for 6ish months), and the color and fit holds up. I usually tear through a pair of tennis shoes a few times a year, these have held up better than most and still look great.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Bouchelle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear Adidas Cloudfoam shoes, but I'm now switching to Puma for a while because they are incredibly comfortable! I walked over 5 miles at Disney World with these shoes when I first got them and my feet felt as rested and fresh at the end of the day as they did at the beginning. It was actually noticeable how great my feet felt! I've also gotten complimented by multiple people about how nice they look.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Basic and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says. I don't usually wear socks, so breaking in new shoes can be a pain. These are already breaking in fairly painlessly, and for the money and being able to get it in size 14, I really cannot complain. Just a good all-around walking shoe, albeit one without a mountain of arch support (so if you need a fairly sizeable lump under your arch, look elsewhere).
customer_reviews.author: T. Pacher

customer_reviews.title: Puma's fit well
customer_reviews.text: Puma's suede sneakers fit my feet better than any other sneaker out there other than the waaaay over priced flimsy chuck taylors (they were $12.00) when I was in High School. I will continue to buy Puma Suede until they stop making them, but I'd rather buy the suede mids if they would make more of them.
customer_reviews.author: L8N8

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will smell rotten
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look nice but my goodness do they make your feet smell terrible. I've never had that problem before. I don't know if they just aren't breathable or what. Gross. Had to throw them out after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Casazza

customer_reviews.title: Tight squeeze
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits very narrow. I have size 13 feet, but they're not fat. The style and wear are great so far. I'll follow up with whether they get broken into a better fit or wear out more quickly than could be expected. Only worn a few times. So far I'd recommend them for style not for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Bright red, comfortable and stylish shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors, my feet are wide which is why I wanted to get the men's shoes. These are a little wider than the women's shoes but still a bit snug. It's really comfortable and has a soft insole. Pumas generally don't disappoint! I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: MissApril

customer_reviews.title: Puma Mens Smash V2 Blue Sneakers are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love Puma Sneakers not just because they look really cool, and they do look really cool by the way, but because they are really comfortable and also Puma tends to run a tad bit wider than most other big name brands, and since i have slightly wider feet Puma always fits me just right
customer_reviews.author: ProfesserP

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: I really like them. They are a bit too small around the toe area. But I have absolutely flat feet and I've broken one too boot so..... beautiful shoe. I kept the box and paper inside to keep the shape if I'm just going to be around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Dozer

customer_reviews.title: So Dorky
customer_reviews.text: Pumas are my shoes of choice. I have several pairs and plan to get move. BUT - This pair/model is built like a pair of 1990 Rockport or Reebok shoes. The styling and the amount of comfort/support jammed in. They are so dorky and went back.
customer_reviews.author: Cabin Builder

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality Puma
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is super thin on the sole, not like all the other Puma shoes I have purchased in the past. The $2.00 they saved on manufacturing rendered this shoe not worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: jack braddell

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look good and feel good! They match with anything too. My only complaint would be that they have very little arch support, but I usually have to buy insoles for shoes like this anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: On time
customer_reviews.text: On time, but not as described. I have bought a number of Puma shoes over the years, and they usually run a little small. This pair is much larger than I expected. I would rate them as large for any shoe brand, but really large for Puma.
customer_reviews.author: roger d hebert

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. High quality, soft and comfortable. My previous Puma Sneakers suede were tough and rough.
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: Old School!
customer_reviews.text: Love the old school Pumas. Comfortable and look great. Wore these back in the day and glad to see Puma still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: RLH

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but short life
customer_reviews.text: Feels great at first but they dont last long... within 4 months the bottom of the inside of the shoes were worn so thin you barely feel like you are wearing shoes. I only wear them about 3 days a week. Expected better wear from them.
customer_reviews.author: Drew K

customer_reviews.title: Adidas to Puma!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoe. Was always partial to Adidas brand. These look and feel much more slick. Comfortable. Great fit at my regular size. Takes a day or so to break them in but now fit like a glove. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Improved design for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: More comfy than the older version. Support is mild but there. Width is as expected. Appears to be authentic and good quality. Ordered double wide laces elsewhere as that's the classic look I prefer. Sneakers arrived timely and as described!
customer_reviews.author: Norell

customer_reviews.title: To narrow not like my my other 2 pairs, not sure why so different
customer_reviews.text: I wear this style shoe on a daily basis, this model for some reason was very narrow. Not sure if it was just a bad run or what but way to narrow and couldnt wear for even 5 minutes before starting to hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Downinthedsm515

customer_reviews.title: Bit too big
customer_reviews.text: These are about the same size as another set of Puma sneakers that are half a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: 乇乂丅尺卂丅卄工匚匚

customer_reviews.title: More narrow than normal
customer_reviews.text: These are nice classics but the toe box in these is very narrow and if you have even a slight width to your toe box don't buy these. Great if you have narrow feet... I have puma classics and the toe box is definitely narrow on these compared to them...
customer_reviews.author: MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: insole deteriorated after a day .  Otherwise ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality of my previous pumas. Then I found them at the local big box store. Not the sign of a quality product. the insoles just disintegrated. The foam fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: B-row

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I’ve bought so far
customer_reviews.text: I like this puma look . When I got these for a low price I expected low quality . Whoa was I wrong . Very comfortable and fit perfect . Look great too
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: very cool
customer_reviews.text: i had a pair of vlydes in the seveties, and these are greta love them, very comfy, cool for walking around and stuff, very vintage cool
customer_reviews.author: Dee dee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for a comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a comfortable, casual sneaker. My other "sneakers" are florescent colored running shoes, and really a little off for wearing with casual clothing. This shoe fits the bill very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lavigne

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made with super comfortable sole inserts! They are a slimmer made shoe (like chuck Taylor’s) so I wouldn’t recommend if you have wide feet. Very happy w/ my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable Pumas
customer_reviews.text: I've been much happier with other puma styles. Insoles are very light foam, not good for much walking. A little tight across the top of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Happy mommy

customer_reviews.title: Quality, stylish, and fits as intended!
customer_reviews.text: Idk why anyone would rate these negatively. I paid $19.99 for some pumas!!!?. Hands down best deal I’ve ever gotten on a pair of shoes! The product is quality and fit as intended. I mean if you’re thinking these are like sports shoes then you’re mistaken. They are meant for everyday use with like going out, school, or work. If you’re looking for sports shoes then you definitely want to go the nike or adidas route.
customer_reviews.author: Guildmaster

customer_reviews.title: Ordered size 9. Got 10 1/2.
customer_reviews.text: Sent me size 10.5 and I ordered size 9. They are nice shoes otherwise. I gave them to the guy who holds a sign on the off ramp on my way to work. He liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel D. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great old school shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE them! Just like the old days, only better. So friggin comfortable. Little narrow at first but you definitely break them in pretty quickly. Same shoe I loved twenty/thirty years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Kensa Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My brother loved them! says they're very comfortable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Froggybaby

customer_reviews.title: Cool Deal
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what everybody else talking sbout with the sneakers being placebo's but they seem legit to me. Perfect fit and had a nice smooth suede finish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insole Quality is Non-Existent
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these shoes less than 20 times and the insoles are already falling apart. There is zero cushioning. If you purchase these shoes, make sure you purchase some quality sole inserts as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The color is exactly as pictured. The size on the box seems to be in UK men’s sizing but the sizes listed above are US men’s sizes. That took some guess work but other than that. I’m happy and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: vlam78

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fit my husband size 11 perfectly. Not much arch support will have to get insoles but comfy overall.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers, snug fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit tight. Had to order a size larger than I normally wear just to get my foot in albeit they’re still tight.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh there pumas!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love puma so cool last long enough wish more colors available not in size 4or5 be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: William Kelley

customer_reviews.title: A lot to like, but feels very small compared to my other pumas
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to rate this. My last pair of very similar Pumas was the same size but I can hardly fit my feet in these. They feel a size too small. I like everything else though :|
customer_reviews.author: J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: PUMA rocks.
customer_reviews.text: Love that PUMA makes a cheaper version of their more expensive models. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Small Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Seems like original Puma high quality shoes. Good all around fit. Just plan to wear with Jean's around town, no running or working out.
customer_reviews.author: wyoguy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, fit well and look good. I like good stuff...
customer_reviews.author: TODD B.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & good looking
customer_reviews.text: These are great looking shoes. My 14 year old is EXTREMELY picky when it comes to what he will wear. These shoes look much more expensive than they are. Good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lara Tebo

customer_reviews.title: Cushy comfort!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. They are simple and super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Missy McCormick

customer_reviews.title: High quality shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Puma is an exceptional shoe brand. They are high quality. Worth way more than the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kym Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: First time with this type of shoe. I mostly wear running shoes but I wanted something a bit more casual. I love the color I selected.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: They fit great and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Returned these. The Iron gate color is not how it appears in the picture. This is all one color, very monotone and no contrast as it shows in the photos. They fit great and are comfortable, but I could not get past the color.
customer_reviews.author: KrisH

customer_reviews.title: finally got a pair
customer_reviews.text: my older brothers each had some pairs of these shoes and I wanted them then, I had to choose between converse and these puma's and these actually feel good, converse look cool but aren't comfortable at all
customer_reviews.author: scott turnbow

customer_reviews.title: Torn up shoes
customer_reviews.text: Boxed looked like it was chewed up by a junkyard dog. Shoe looks like it’s been stepped on. Looks like someone walked a mile in these shoes before they shipped them to me. Really disappointing. Did I miss something that says these shoes were used?
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Narrow and small
customer_reviews.text: Feels at least 1/2 size smaller and narrower than last two pairs of Adidas I’ve bought.
customer_reviews.author: T. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I didn't know it came with an foam insert.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Long

customer_reviews.title: Sole breaks too easily
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for 2 months and the soles are already wearing out and I can feel the inside of the shoe too well, it's not as comfortable. I've only worn Pumas for almost 10 years now and this is the first one that I can't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Eric H

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very narrow & hard. They are not pliable to break in. Returned
customer_reviews.author: PMommy3

customer_reviews.title: ... wasn’t sure what to expect but these shoe were perfect. The fit just right and they’re sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure what to expect but these shoe were perfect. The fit just right and they’re sturdy, well made, and comfortable. I loved them so much I ordered a second pair - different color. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: randall keller

customer_reviews.title: He likes them
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my husband he where's them as nice shoes
customer_reviews.author: Joylene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller, product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller, product, delivery. Purchased as a gift and the recipient said these shoes "fit like a glove". Very pleased with this purchase and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Really narrow shoes
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable shoes I ever had, I can not wear them for more than an hour. So narrow, it's a big relief to take them off. And I'm a skinny man, I'm 6"3' 170 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: William G.

customer_reviews.title: Class style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Like always classic style and comfort. Old school is in lol I'm old so I fit in well. Lol
customer_reviews.author: A. Mushala

customer_reviews.title: nice and smooth..
customer_reviews.text: nice sneakers, like the color matching, soft comfortable, I always been a fan of puma classic..
customer_reviews.author: tito

customer_reviews.title: All Men's Puma shoes are great
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband. The color is out of his comfort zone but I thought a good color for summer and the price was right. He has a wider foot and Puma seems to really fit him well.
customer_reviews.author: Emmes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fit is true to size. They fit great and are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jose Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, fits well and they last
customer_reviews.text: I have a very active middle school age son who loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Patty M.

customer_reviews.title: Always LOVED these sneaks.
customer_reviews.text: Had these when I was in the 7th grade! So happy to find these here! Made me feel so nostalgic an remembered how good thinks were back then.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great show
customer_reviews.text: Iv always been a puma junkie since the early 80’s and I still love them. 1st time ever getting this color GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shavonne Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, order a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. I fluctuate betwen sizes, so it was a tad bit to small, but otherwise it was really comfortable. I sent them back, bit will be ordering a size larger, they are otherwise comfortable and stylish. Arived quickly with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Schauer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfy shoe
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for a friend. It fits perfectly. Well made shoe. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dietz-Nord

customer_reviews.title: Seem a little thin but i think that'll be a good thing in the summer time
customer_reviews.text: I use them for mountain biking and so far so good. Good flex and good grip on the pins of the peddles.
customer_reviews.author: Wade P

customer_reviews.title: Kickin It With Puma
customer_reviews.text: These kicks feel great, and so affordable! The styles are so hard to choose from at times, I’ve already ordered and received my second pair. Lacing them up FAT the way I used to back in the day in high school Pumpin that LL Cool J classic “My Radio”!!
customer_reviews.author: Pitroick

customer_reviews.title: Men's Puma's
customer_reviews.text: By far, these are the most comfortable shoes I have EVER worn! I love my Puma's! The bar has been set. I'm purchasing another pair and will be very upset if they aren't as comfortable. C. Hodge-Young
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hodge-Young

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers overall. I was looking for a nice low cut sneaker for the warmer weather. Sizing is true to what I wear in other brands such as Nike and Converse. I have a moderately flat foot and these are comfortable out of the box to walk all day with no discomfort or break-in needed. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The_Casual_Cutter

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and have gotten tons of compliments while wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight compare to other brands
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it since there was no higher size available.
customer_reviews.author: khoa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! Very nice! I bought 3 pairs and am going to buy some more!!!
customer_reviews.author: YELDA DAYAT-SANCHEZ

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy, its good quality and very nice.. delivered in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Haval Sultan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am a female and these shoes fit me perfectly. I wear a 6 mens and they are true to size. Very comfortable fitting shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller than actual size selected
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend wears an 11 and has two other pairs of Puma's similar in style, and these ran small - had to exchange them for a 12. But super easy exchange and got the new pair in a few days!
customer_reviews.author: Danelle

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Foam soles are extremely comfortable, and the fit was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: jenny cromwell

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I had a different color from this series before so I know what I am going to get, happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: It’s a little narrow but should stretch to fit eventually...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this sneaker. As expected, there is minimal arch support. It’s a little narrow.
customer_reviews.author: elmer s cruz

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: The fit size is off but the show is great quality
customer_reviews.author: michael t minutello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely! comfortable shoe. I love the fit! Well put together shoe! Quality excellent! Can't say nothing I don't like about this shoe. Even the dark blue color is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Squeeze Marshall

customer_reviews.title: It's a great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The box came damaged but the shoes are perfect stay fit and look great you can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple sneakers
customer_reviews.text: They were worth it when they were $25 a pair.
customer_reviews.author: kimosabe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Men's casual sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a size 14, and these sneakers are great. Suede upper so the style isn't too casual and size runs true. He loves them, and gets compliments for the style. Perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Waymire

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is fresh...
customer_reviews.text: ...but they don't even make them in anything close to wide. The normal sized shoe they sell looks like a ski. Which is ashamed, because I'd buy one of every color if they had wides... real wides, I figure wide for them would be a human sized regular. I don't know, maybe Europeans are narrow of foot.
customer_reviews.author: A Casey Ellis

customer_reviews.title: They always fit my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I only buy Pumas because I only like Pumas 👍
customer_reviews.author: oohboytate

customer_reviews.title: Great kicks!
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable shoes at an unbeatable price. Huge selection of colors and style variations. My 7th pair!
customer_reviews.author: fergie1321

customer_reviews.title: Great Job
customer_reviews.text: Great price, prompt delivery, actually a day early, exactly what I ordered, great fit, Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: ken nosse

customer_reviews.title: Puma
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes. Wore all day traveling thru airport etc. Plus the throw back look is what I expected and remember.
customer_reviews.author: Ah

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sadly these are running a bit narrow although the style they have replaced fit my husbands wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M Reisen

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable shoes. I bought them for a long stint ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes. I bought them for a long stint in Europe, and so far they've treated me well.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

product_meta.title: PUMA Smash V2 Sneaker
product_meta.description: The PUMA smash V2 is the new interpretation of the PUMA smash icon. The tennis inspired silhouette features a soft suede upper with an improved fit. The updated outsole offers a clean look and premium grip and durability. The all time classic is made for daily wear!.
